creditline: The Winton Jones Endowment Fund for Prints and Drawings
description: Joseph at R looking at a large book, seated sideways on a ledge, with landscape beyond; Mary at L, looking toward Joseph and steadying infants Jesus and John the Baptist on cushions at LLC

title: The Holy Family with Saint John the Baptist
